title: Financial Anaylst at Chelsea Search Group (Los Angeles, CA)
text: Financial Analyst - Los Angeles, CA Job Summary: The Los Angeles headquarters seeks a Financial Analyst for its Finance department. This position will participate in department projects, such as profitability analysis, process improvement and other value-add assignments in addition to the traditional financial reporting and variance analysis. The position also provides ad hoc analysis reporting to management on an as-needed basis, such as identifying spending trends, analyzing variances, vendor consolidation and for other purposes as requested. The candidate must demonstrate initiative by regularly reviewing processes, both internal and external, and eliciting feedback and making recommendations for improvements, maintaining a high degree of customer focus. Qualifications: The candidate must have superior analytical, reasoning skills and excellent judgment as well as exceptional attention to detail. Must have Advanced level Excel skills . Should be self-directed with a high level of initiative and possess strong oral and written communications skills, including the ability to format and edit complex communications, and reports appropriately across functional department lines and/or to senior management. The ability to effectively interact with people at all staff levels with a demonstrated "can-do" approach and strong customer service focus is necessary. Should have the ability to view business issues in perspective and follow-up on projects/assignments and be able to prioritize and participate in multiple projects simultaneously. Education/Experience: A Bachelor's degree in Accounting or Finance is required as well as a high-level proficiency in spreadsheet analysis. To Apply: For immediate consideration, please submit current resume and desired pay to: cfleck@chelsearecruiters.com
